text:
Traffic police allowed to issue small accidents from a smartphone
01 Nov 2019, 08:54 by Artyom Bausov
From today in Russia in test mode the service of registration of road accident online is launched. All you need is a smartphone app.
Approval was given by the traffic police and the Russian Union of Auto Insurers (RSA). You can issue a car accident through the free OSAGO Assistant program, which fills out the electronic version of the Euro protocol.
Information about the participants is automatically entered from the SAR and State service databases. Users only need to photograph the damage and attach a photo of the accident diagram. After that, a QR code will appear, which will be scanned by the second driver for confirmation.
The function is now available in Moscow, St. Petersburg, Moscow Region, Leningrad Region and Tatarstan. Since 2021, the application will work throughout Russia. [News]
